[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [IExperimentsJson](./rush-lib.iexperimentsjson.md) &gt; [phasedCommands](./rush-lib.iexperimentsjson.phasedcommands.md)

## IExperimentsJson.phasedCommands property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

If true, the phased commands feature is enabled. To use this feature, create a "phased" command in common/config/rush/command-line.json.

**Signature:**

```typescript
phasedCommands?: boolean;
```
